name: Day Deer, Night Deer
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS GAME IS STILL IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT, IT WILL BE IMPROVED UPON

Day Deer, Night Deer is a mirror platformer with a day and night theme.

You are Leg, who must travel through the land of night and day to find, and shoot (or stab) the evil lord Mike.

Graphics by Ninety - GMC - Twitter

You can download or buy the soundtrack on bandcamp!
